      • setLocationTrackingEnabled

        public static void setLocationTrackingEnabled(android.content.Context context,
                                              boolean enabled)
        Toggles the state of the background location tracking service
        Parameters:
        context - An Android context
        enabled - true if the service should be enabled, false otherwise

        public static boolean isLocationTrackingEnabled(android.content.Context context)
        Checks whether the background location tracking service is enabled
        Parameters:
        context - An Android context
        Returns:
        true if the service is enabled, false otherwise

      • requestRetailImageThumbnail

        public static com.inlocomedia.android.core.communication.Request requestRetailImageThumbnail(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                             java.lang.String retailId,
                                                                                             com.inlocomedia.android.core.communication.listeners.ImageRequestListener listener)
        Request the retail's thumbnail image from the server. You may force the request to bypass the cache by setting the useCache parameter as false.
        Parameters:
        retailId - The retail's ID

      • requestMaps

        public static com.inlocomedia.android.core.communication.Request requestMaps(android.content.Context context,
                                                                             java.lang.String retailId,
                                                                             com.inlocomedia.android.location.core.communication.listeners.RetailMapsRequestListener listener)
                                                                      throws com.inlocomedia.android.core.exception.InLocoMediaAPIException
        Get the retails' maps from server
        Parameters:
        retailId - The retail's ID
        Returns:
        A JSONObject with all retails' maps
        Throws:
        com.inlocomedia.android.core.exception.InLocoMediaAPIException - Wraps the errors. Read the InLocoMediaAPIException documentation for more details.

      • requestMapImage

        public static com.inlocomedia.android.core.communication.Request requestMapImage(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                 java.lang.String retailId,
                                                                                 java.lang.String mapId,
                                                                                 com.inlocomedia.android.location.core.communication.listeners.RetailMapImageRequestListener listener)
        Get the retail's map's image from server using cache
        Parameters:
        retailId - The retails' ID
        mapId - the retail's map ID

      • requestMapImage

        public static com.inlocomedia.android.core.communication.Request requestMapImage(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                 java.lang.String retailId,
                                                                                 java.lang.String mapId,
                                                                                 boolean useCache,
                                                                                 com.inlocomedia.android.location.core.communication.listeners.RetailMapImageRequestListener listener)
        Request the retail map's image from the server. You may force the request to bypass the cache by setting the boolean parameter as false.
        Parameters:
        retailId - the id of the retail that has the map
        mapId - the selected retail map's id
        useCache - true if you want to use cache, false if you do not want to.

                                                                               com.inlocomedia.android.location.core.communication.listeners.StoresRequestListener listener)

        public static void requestMapsLocationUpdates(android.content.Context context,
                                              com.inlocomedia.android.location.listeners.LocationListener listener)
        Register a listener for the InLocoMediaService results. Unregister it with the removeMapsLocationUpdates(Context, LocationListener) method
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the activity you want to register the broadcast receiver
        listener - the interface that implement the callback

      • requestLocation

        public static void requestLocation(android.content.Context context,
                                   com.inlocomedia.android.location.listeners.LocationListener listener)
        Register a listener for the InLocoMediaService for a single location result. Automatically unregister the listener after the callback is received
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the activity you want to register the broadcast receiver
        listener - the interface that implement the results

      • requestLocationPermission

        public static void requestLocationPermission(android.app.Activity context,
                                             boolean askIfDenied)
        Creates, if necessary, a new activity that will request the authorization for that permission.
        Parameters:
        context - An Android Context
        askIfDenied - whether the user should be asked again if the permission has been previously denied

      • requestCoarseLocationPermission

        public static void requestCoarseLocationPermission(android.app.Activity context,
                                                   boolean askIfDenied)
        Creates, if necessary, a new activity that will request the authorization for that permission.
        Parameters:
        context - An Android Context
        askIfDenied - whether the user should be asked again if the permission has been previously denied

      • requestPermissions

        public static void requestPermissions(android.app.Activity context,
                                      java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                      boolean askIfDenied,
                                      com.inlocomedia.android.core.permissions.PermissionsListener listener)
        If necessary, creates a new activity to request the user for the permissions, and alert the listener on completion.
        Parameters:
        context - An Android context
        permissions - Set of permissions to be granted
        askIfDenied - whether the user should be asked again if the permission has been previously denied
        listener - Listener that will receive a hashmap with the permissions, whether they were granted or not and if their status has changed
